creator: gmzjhz@hotmail.com
text:
We create multiple sheets and set comment in some cells in each sheet in Java file.
Then download excel and comment is displayed in a drawing object like textbox.
But when we delete one sheet in the downloaded excel, the shape of the comment box in all the remaining sheets changes to a giant Curved Arrow.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 55410 ***
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
